Module com.example.cs213_cafe_project
Package com.example.cs213_cafe_project

Class OrderDonutsController

java.lang.Object
com.example.cs213_cafe_project.OrderDonutsController
public class OrderDonutsController extends Object
Controller class for donutsView.fxml Does all the event handling and the action handling for the donut view. Sends and receives data with the mainController.

    • OrderDonutsController

      public OrderDonutsController()

  • Method Details

    • setMainController

      public void setMainController(MainController controller)
      Initializes an instance of the mainController and sets mainController to that value
      Parameters:
      controller - The controller class object

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      init method that runs as soon as the .fxml file is set and staged - set all monetary textFields to $0.00 - Disable all buttons until the type of the donut has been chosen - sets the comboBox values

    • displaySelected

      public void displaySelected()
      Action handler for comboBox "Choose Donuts" Will display a list of items to be selected in a dropdown menu. This dropdown menu depends on the donutType selected.

    • addToOrderButtonClicked

      public void addToOrderButtonClicked()
      Sends the BasketItems in the donutViewBasket to the FullBasket object in the mainController. Clears the local basket object. And resets the buttons to init values.

    • setInitialBasket

      public void setInitialBasket()
      Event handler for loadBasketButton Will set the items in the basket to what they were initially. Almost like a retrieve data function

    • removeButtonClicked

      public void removeButtonClicked()
      Event handler for removeButton removes the basketItem from the donutBasket. Updates the Sub-total accordingly

    • setSelectionPrice

      public void setSelectionPrice()
      Sets the running subtotal of the donut if there is enough information to calculate a price.

    • enableRemoveBox

      public void enableRemoveBox()
      Enables the remove button

    • addToBasket

      public void addToBasket()
      Adds BasketItem to the donutViewBasket. MenuItem will always be a donut. Resets the combo-box values and sets the subtotal back to $0.00

    • setBasketPrice

      private void setBasketPrice()
      helper method to set the price of a the basket.

    • resetComboBoxValue

      private void resetComboBoxValue(javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<String> comboBox)
      Sets the comboBox value back to the value of its promptText
      Parameters:
      comboBox - The combo box we want to reset

    • priceByType

      private void priceByType(String donutType, double quantity, String donutFlavorType)
      Sets the selectionTotal textField to the price of the specific donut that we have selected
      Parameters:
      donutType - String type of Donut
      quantity - double quantity of donut
      donutFlavorType - String flavor of Donut

    • enableSubmitToBasketBox

      private void enableSubmitToBasketBox()
      Enable "add Basket to Order" Button

    • enableAmountBox

      private void enableAmountBox()
      Enables numDonuts ComboBox

    • reset

      private void reset()
      resets the buttons and text revert to disable = true and "$0.00"

    • getHoleFlavor

      private HoleFlavor getHoleFlavor(String flavorType)
      helper method to get the HoleFlavor enum Object
      Parameters:
      flavorType - String flavor of donut
      Returns:
      corresponding HoleFlavor Object

      private YeastFlavor getYeastFlavor(String flavorType)
      helper method to get the YeastFlavor enum Object
      Parameters:
      flavorType - String flavor of donut
      Returns:
      corresponding YeastFlavor Object

      private CakeFlavor getCakeFlavor(String flavorType)
      helper method to get the CakeFlavor enum Object
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      corresponding CakeFlavor Object

    • format

      private String format(String input)
      Formats String input to a String number with only 2 decimal places.
      Parameters:
      input - String number Ex: "1.2"
      Returns:
      String Ex: "1.20"
